title: The second set of madrigals, and pastorals, of 3. 4. 5. and 6. parts apt for violls and voyces: newly composed by Francis Pilkington, Batchelar of Musicke, and lutenist, and chaunter of the Cathedrall Church of Christ, and blessed Mary the Virgin, in Chester.
author: Pilkington, Francis, d. 1638.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham, for M[atthew] L[ownes] and A. B[rowne],
